pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visualisation Toolbox for 'easystats' and Extra Geoms, Themes and Color Palettes for 'ggplot2' // Provides plotting utilities supporting easystats-packages (https://github.com/easystats/easystats) and some extra themes, geoms, and scales for 'ggplot2'. Color scales are based on https://www.materialui.co/colors.
